thread.title: Sports Person of the Week - Brian Smith
thread.title_full: Sports Person of the Week - Brian Smith

author: Mike Gaither
title: Sports Person of the Week - Brian Smith
text:
Sports Person of the Week - Brian Smith - KPLC 7 News, Lake Charles, Louisiana Member Center: Sports Person of the Week - Brian Smith Posted: SPORTS PERSON OF THE WEEK (KPLC) LAKE CHARLES, LA (KPLC) - 
On Friday, Barbe wide receiver Brian Smith made a last second touchdown grab that beat rival Sam Houston, 52-49. 
"There really wasn't anything going through my mind, it was just a lot of action. I was running around happy and just hyped overall. I was just happy and everybody came down congratulating me," said Smith. 
The senior wideout knew going into the final drive, he wanted the football to win the game."Before they called the play I was telling [Gavin Nettles, Barbe's quarterback] if anything happens, just throw it at the highest point. That's a real good advantage on my part, just knowing I can go up and get the ball at any point in any game, and any situation." 
Smith did more than just score on the final whistle, his effort was felt throughout the game. The transfer receiver hauled in seven passes for 236 yards and four touchdowns, to cap off the best performances of his career. 
"Once I got the ball the first time and got the touchdown I knew tonight's going to be a good night." Can't Find Something?
